main event: A bright round light was observed in the sky over Ludwigshafen, Germany on 15 May 1964, moving in a zigzag pattern.
interesting points: The light was estimated to be about 10-15 meters in diameter.,The object was observed for approximately 2-3 minutes before disappearing.,Several reliable witnesses, including a police officer and a railway worker, provided consistent accounts.,The estimated speed of the object was 100-150 knots.,This sighting was being forwarded for further investigation to higher headquarters.
sighted object: a bright round light in the sky
witness description: reliable witnesses including a police officer, a railway worker, and two private citizens
